content.html: Okay, so does anyone else use a standing desk? I decided that 2023 was the year I converted to standing at work to benefit my health and core strength. Does anyone have any tips for making the move from sitting for hours every day for years to my new standing desk?
content.value:
Okay, so does anyone else use a standing desk? 

I decided that 2023 was the year I converted to standing at work to benefit my health and core strength. 

Does anyone have any tips for making the move from sitting for hours every day for years to my new standing desk?
